response.original_title: The Queen and Charles: Mother and Son
response.overview: Documentary exploring the relationship between the Queen and Prince Charles. The programme charts significant moments in both their lives, from the Queen’s coronation when her eldest son was three years old to Charles’ divorce. In recent years, Charles has taken on an increasing amount of his mother’s royal responsibilities, allowing a glimpse into the kind of king he will eventually become.
response.title: The Queen and Charles: Mother and Son
